to information about the North-South Expressway project, the section
passing through Binh Thuan province does not have
a drainage system at some points.
This causes water to flood from high and low, causing
people's houses to flood and fruits and vegetables to become inundated
when it rains.  In addition, the construction
also harms the people's country
according to regulations. If the organization of construction
causes damage to people's property,
the responsibility for repair and compensation belongs to the
construction contractors. Currently, the contractors have
coordinated with  Related parties work
with local authorities and affected households
to complete compensation support procedures
expected to be completed
this October to minimize the impact on
people and public sector enterprises.  The
Ministry of Transport has
requested the investors to direct the
construction contractors to arrange a temporary system to clear the
stream for drainage to
urgently organize the construction of the remaining items
to complete the handover.  In the entire
project, doctors in the emergency department of

a serious traffic accident that caused
casualties as soon as 13 cases were received.
In which a patient died outside the

mobilize all the doctors and nurses present to
organize emergency care for the patient even though on
Sunday we pressed the red alarm to
mobilize.  All the doctors in the
existing hospital as well as the doctors from
the clinic participated in supporting the rescue department.
Within 1 hour, we were able to
rescue everyone. Currently, the
remaining 11 people's health is stable.  At

traveling in the opposite direction,

Thanh Hoa Provincial Police Department said that

Binh and a number of other subjects  involved

it as global temperatures Warm. In

Hindu heritage at Up Sala Town Hall  has
just been renovated and the highlight
of this building is not only in the
visual aspect but also in the auditory aspect.
Virtual reality software was used in the
design process to ensure the building provides the
best audio experience.
Architects use a
new technology called trel. This is a
simulation platform that allows designers to
view simulated images of buildings
in a virtual reality environment, and they
can also listen to audio tests.  sound in
different spaces, for example, the
architects decided to change the
ceiling material from plastic to glass
after hearing the sound of rain falling on
these two materials in a Virtual Reality environment.  The
bar is embedded
in the architecture with
carefully selected materials to both ensure the design of
the space and ensure a
good sound environment. Everything is meticulously designed
through many tests and adjustments on
treble software.
Launched in March this year by Iceland-based treble technologies, according to
